cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with optimization problems related to influence propagation in social networks, which is a topic that falls under the subfield of social network analysis. Therefore, cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves the analysis of NP-hard problems and the development of approximation algorithms, which are common topics in the subfields of algorithms and complexity theory. Therefore, cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.CC (Computational Complexity), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are also likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper involves experimental comparisons of different algorithms, which falls under the subfield of machine learning. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely sub-category.
